original_title: SAITM, Neville Fernando Hospital to be integrated into Moratuwa University
original_body_lines: Colombo, May 31 - The South Asian Institute of Technology and Medicine (SAITM) along with the Neville Fernando Teaching Hospital (NFTH) will be officially transferred to the Faculty of Medicine at the University of Moratuwa in August 2024.
The announcement was made by the President’s Media Division (PMD).
